item.title: Report E-2024110338
item.description:
Report E-2024110338

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-21T12:39:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-08
  • City: NEENAH
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately 1/2 gallon of Rapicide PA Part B released from one (1) gallon plastic jug. Personnel advised release impacted the trailer floor, the team cleaned release using Oil Dri absorbent. Dayton Freight confirmed cleanup completed and they generated two (2) five (5) gallon poly drums of waste, one containing 1-gallon plastic jug of product and the second containing product and spent absorbent. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
